p:
Communities with the highest percentage of recent immigrants were Quaqtaq, Iqaluit, Inuvik, and Coral Harbor. Statistics Canada defines recent immigrant as individuals who have immigrated to Canada between 2011 and 2016. Naujaat had the youngest population with the median age of 18 and 43.1% of the population under 14. Postville had the oldest population with an average age of 41.2 and over 17.1% of the population over 65.
7
